content: Write a paragraph about flowers using only words that begin with 'f'.

Fascinating flowers flourish fabulously, filling fabulous fields with fantastic fragrances. Feathered friends flock frequently to feast on their nectar, fostering fertilization. Florists favor fetching flora for formal functions, framing facades with fantastic flair. Forests feature a fascinating array of flowering plants, from flamboyant foxgloves to frail ferns. Fondly, folks foster gardens, fostering friendships through shared fascination with these floral wonders.
